text: @BilldeBlasio @ewarren @BernieSanders Sorry Donal-I mean Bill. Less tweeting & more Coronavirus eradication. Why haven’t you closed public schools yet? Are you nuts? Just because kids don’t get hit hard doesn’t mean their immuno-compromised family members won’t.
